warning.price_change: Warning: On {{date}} your subscription price will change from {{old_price}} to {{new_price}}.
warning.scheduled_downgrade: Warning: The downgrade from plan {{from}} to {{to}} is scheduled for {{date}}. Some features may not be available in the new plan.
warning.cancel_at_period_end: Warning: Your subscription will be canceled on {{date}}.
warning.canceled: Warning: Your subscription has been canceled. To continue using the system, you need to update your plan.
